landing.header: Putting the FUN back into sending funds
landing.title: Save valuable seconds, when sending money with Revolut

card-content.title: Sending money, easy by default
card-content.subtitle: Moving money should never take more than a few taps. Transfers are always free between Revolut friends (and you can even add a gif, apparently the kids love it these days)

card-content.title: Request money in any combo
card-content.subtitle: Choose your way to ask for money: send payment links, try ‘near me’ or flash QR codes, so there’s no escape from paying you back

card-content.title: Make money chats less ~awk~
card-content.description: Use our encrypted Chat to settle up, swap gifs, and send reminders so you’ll never have to text your old flatmate, or ex, again

card-content.title: Split and settle bills without the stress
card-content.subtitle: From restaurant tabs to rent, split bills with anyone, even if they’re not on Revolut. Just tell us and we’ll do the maths

card-content.title: Share your @Revtag for easy social payments
card-content.subtitle: Choose your unique username and generate a shareable URL to collect money from friends,  family or anyone else, privately and securely. No bank details needed

footer.subtitle: What are you waiting for?
footer.title: Get the only financial super app
